kubejs.ponder.Precision_Mechanism_Crafte: This is the best way to automate early in the game!
But in the chest, place the items from which your item is created
Position the mechanical belt and chute
Do not forget to install the gears (can be done without the housing)
Instead of a stone, you can use any other block
kubejs.ponder.fission_r.text_1: This is how a reactor should be built!
kubejs.ponder.fission_r.text_2: The yellow colour indicates the entry of objects into the reactor
kubejs.ponder.fission_r.text_3: Red colour indicates energy input to the reactor
kubejs.ponder.fission_r.text_4: Green colour indicates the exit of objects from the reactor
kubejs.ponder.fission_r.text_5: Place the Fission core in the centre of a total of 3 pieces
kubejs.ponder.fission_r.text_6: Place the Fission Chamber in the centre of the structure
kubejs.ponder.fusion_r.text_1: This is how a reactor should be built!
kubejs.ponder.fusion_r.text_2: The yellow colour indicates the entry of objects into the reactor
kubejs.ponder.fusion_r.text_3: Red colour indicates energy input to the reactor
kubejs.ponder.fusion_r.text_4: Green colour indicates the exit of objects from the reactor
kubejs.ponder.fusion_r.text_5: Place the Fission core in the centre of a total of 3 pieces
kubejs.ponder.fusion_r.text_6: Place the Fission Chamber in the centre of the structure
kubejs.ponder.gen_pressor.text_1: Place the bottles in the bottler
kubejs.ponder.gen_pressor.text_3: Activate the piston with the lever to kill the bee and get its gene
kubejs.ponder.hephaestus_forge.text_3: If you want to make mystical crystals, here are the moves you need to make:
kubejs.ponder.sot_farm.text_1: One of the options for building a honeycomb farm
kubejs.ponder.sot_farm.text_2: ATTENTION: CONNECT EVERYTHING AS SHOWN IN THE SCENE FOR CORRECT OPERATION!
kubejs.ponder.sot_farm.text_3: Place the honeycomb in the black chest
kubejs.ponder.sot_farm.text_5: The red box will contain the result
kubejs.ponder.vodogortenzia_farm.text_3: Place 20 water hydrangeas around the water
kubejs.ponder.vodogortenzia_farm.text_5: And connect each flower to a mana distributor
kubejs.ponder.vodogortenzia_farm.text_6: Now you need to connect the mana distributor to the mana pool
kubejs.ponder.vodogortenzia_farm.text_7: Unfortunately, over time, water hydrangeas will turn into a dry bush
kubejs.ponder.vodogortenzia_farm.text_8: If you don't want to do this, you need to replace the regular block of grass with enchanted soil. Here's how to do it:
gribtweaks.ponder.andesite_alloy.text_2: В фильтре чаши должен быть андезитовый сплав. Для удобства это будет показывать так:
gribtweaks.ponder.andesite_alloy.text_3: В фильтре воронки должно быть 16 андезита.
gribtweaks.ponder.andesite_alloy.text_4: В фильтре воронки должно быть 16 кусочков железа.
gribtweaks.ponder.andesite_alloy.text_5: В фильтре воронки должно быть "Фильтр". Нажмите пкм с ним в руке и выберите в белый список: Кусочек Железа, Кремень, Гравий.
gribtweaks.ponder.roots_ritual.text_1: Для проведения ритуалов требуется данная структура.
gribtweaks.ponder.roots_ritual.text_2: Поместите ритуальные предметы в жаровни и зажгите их.
gribtweaks.ponder.roots_ritual.text_3: Поместите ритуальные предметы на алтарь, убедитесь, что все сделали правильно, и нажмите Shift + ПКМ.
gribtweaks.ponder.roots_ritual.text_4: Если вы все сделали правильно, то появятся белые частицы.
tm4.ponder.altar.text_1: You can use the altar simply, without any additional structures
tm4.ponder.altar.text_2: In order to make a level 2 altar, you need to place a brazier around it
tm4.ponder.altar.text_3: If you want to make a level 3 altar, place the following blocks:
tm4.ponder.animal_spawner.text_3: In order to summon any animal/mob, you need to throw the items listed in REI on the spinner
tm4.ponder.animal_spawner.text_4: The altar will work when the items are missing
tm4.ponder.arhiology_generator.text_1: The archaeological reactor will generate archaeological sand with a chance of 80% and the ordinary reactor with a chance of 20%.
tm4.ponder.arhiology_generator.text_2: And from this sand you can get a lot of resources!
tm4.ponder.arhiology_generator.text_3: ATTENTION! THE ARCHAEOLOGICAL REACTOR WILL NOT WORK WITHOUT THIS STRUCTURE!
tm4.ponder.concrete_farm.text_4: Set the maximum delay on the redstone repeater
tm4.ponder.concrete_farm.text_6: Set the maximum delay on all redstone transmitters
tm4.ponder.concrete_farm.text_7: Insert dry concrete into the chest
tm4.ponder.concrete_farm.text_8: And throw any block into the funnel to start the mechanism!
tm4.ponder.endoflame.text_1: Let's build a Mana Farm on Endoflames
tm4.ponder.endoflame.text_10: And place a redstone link with filter on it to make droppers work
tm4.ponder.endoflame.text_11: Connect mana spreaders with flowers and with mana pool
tm4.ponder.endoflame.text_3: Now place a storage where you will put coal blocks and pipes that will load items in the droppers
tm4.ponder.endoflame.text_4: Make this pipe as an output
tm4.ponder.endoflame.text_5: You can also make evenly mod in pipe to load fuel in all droppers
tm4.ponder.endoflame.text_6: Put coal blocks in the chest
tm4.ponder.endoflame.text_7: Now place redstone links on all of these droppers
tm4.ponder.endoflame.text_8: Choose filter in the link (we will use a coal block) and right click on them to make them work
tm4.ponder.endoflame.text_9: Now place a hourglass with 40 red sand in it
tm4.ponder.flint_grinder.text_2: Set the maximum delay on the redstone repeater
tm4.ponder.flint_grinder.text_3: Place the grit in the dispenser and start the machine!
tm4.ponder.gaia_ritual.text_1: To make a Gaia summon ritual you have to place an activated beacon in the middle
tm4.ponder.gaia_ritual.text_2: And 4 Gaia pylons 1 block above the beacon
tm4.ponder.gaia_ritual.text_3: And you must have a huge space around the ritual
tm4.ponder.gaia_ritual.text_4: Now, when everything is ready you have to click terrasteel ingot on the beacon
tm4.ponder.gourmaryllis.text_1: Let's build a Mana Farm on Gourmaryllises
tm4.ponder.gourmaryllis.text_2: Put Food in Barrels in the first line
tm4.ponder.gourmaryllis.text_3: And Different food in Barrels in the second line
tm4.ponder.gourmaryllis.text_5: After this count 7 seconds and place 14 sands in second Hourglass
tm4.ponder.gourmaryllis.text_6: And don't forget to connect mana spreaders with flowers!
tm4.ponder.iron_farm.text_1: This is the Beginner's Iron Farm without villagers
tm4.ponder.iron_farm.text_10: Make 1 speed in this Rotational Speed Controller
tm4.ponder.iron_farm.text_12: Make 128 speed in this Rotational Speed Controller
tm4.ponder.iron_farm.text_13: Make 48 speed in these 2 Rotational Speed Controllers
tm4.ponder.iron_farm.text_14: You can place water blocks in mechanical drills
tm4.ponder.iron_farm.text_15: Just need to power our farm
tm4.ponder.iron_farm.text_3: Make sure you placed Iron Nugget in the filters of Brass Funnels
tm4.ponder.iron_farm.text_4: Fill the Mangroves Roots with water
tm4.ponder.iron_farm.text_5: Place Filter with Gravel in Deny List in the funnel
tm4.ponder.iron_farm.text_6: Put Flint in filter of Funnels
tm4.ponder.iron_farm.text_7: Make sure you did NOT place shaft there in belt!
tm4.ponder.lava.text_3: Над котлом должны находиться капельники, разместите их на любой блок.
tm4.ponder.lava.text_4: На блоке, под которым находится капельник, должна быть лава.
tm4.ponder.lava.text_5: Данную структуру можно расширять до бесконечности, тем самым повышая эффективность.
tm4.ponder.mana_tnt_farm.text_1: Place 9 endopentiums (can be floating and in larger quantities)
tm4.ponder.mana_tnt_farm.text_2: Connect the flowers to the mana dispenser and the mana dispenser to the mana pool
tm4.ponder.mana_tnt_farm.text_3: And let's build the main part of the farm!
tm4.ponder.mana_tnt_farm.text_4: Here you need to place a block that passes the redstone signal
tm4.ponder.mana_tnt_farm.text_5: Place 1 sand in the clock (must be YELLOW)
tm4.ponder.mana_tnt_farm.text_6: Now use your favorite method to upload to the TNT distributor
tm4.ponder.nature_aura_altar.text_1: Обратите внимание на основание. Глубинный сланец может быть любым блоком, а все остальные блоки, строго должны находиться в таком расположении.
tm4.ponder.nature_aura_altar.text_2: Если структура построена правильно, то вы увидите зеленые частицы.
tm4.ponder.nature_aura_ritual.text_4: Разместите в центре структуры саженец дуба.
tm4.ponder.occultism.text_1: Your first Occultism Ritual, but how to draw it?
tm4.ponder.occultism.text_2: Firstly, let's use a white chalk. Click on the ground and draw your figure
tm4.ponder.occultism.text_3: Now you should pick a ritual to draw in Dictionary of Spirits, we will draw Aviar's Circle.
tm4.ponder.occultism.text_4: Every ritual has a Golden Sacrifical Bowl in the middle
tm4.ponder.occultism.text_5: We can summon Sapling Trader on Aviar's Circle, so let's do this
tm4.ponder.occultism.text_6: We need to place Oak, Birch, Spruce, Jungle saplings in bowls
tm4.ponder.occultism.text_7: ... And a Bound Book of Binding: Foliot in the middle
tm4.ponder.offering_table.text_1: In order to start the ritual, you need to build this structure
tm4.ponder.offering_table.text_3: Place the first item shown in REI on the table
tm4.ponder.offering_table.text_4: Now put the spirit of the call on the table
tm4.ponder.offering_table.text_5: And the ritual process will start after the particles appear
tm4.ponder.ore_flame_flower.text_2: Connect ignem orechid to mana pool
tm4.ponder.ore_flame_flower.text_3: Place a netherrack around the ignem orechid
tm4.ponder.ore_flame_flower.text_4: Ignem orechid will GENERATE ORE ONLY IN THE LOWER WORLD
tm4.ponder.ore_flame_flower.text_5: Ignem orechid will generate all ores from the lower world and other mods
tm4.ponder.ore_flower.text_3: Place a stone around the orechid
tm4.ponder.ore_flower.text_4: Orechid will generate all ores from the upper world and other mods
tm4.ponder.ore_processing.text_1: Let's build the Ore Processing Machine
tm4.ponder.orechid.text_1: Let's build an ore farm with Orechid
tm4.ponder.orechid.text_2: All hoppers must be directed to this one
tm4.ponder.orechid.text_3: Place five redstone spreaders with mine lens
tm4.ponder.orechid.text_4: Put 8 red sand in this hourglass
tm4.ponder.orechid_ignem.text_1: Let's build an ore farm with an orechid ignem
tm4.ponder.orechid_ignem.text_2: Put netherrack as a filter in the export bus and ME interface
tm4.ponder.orechid_ignem.text_3: And place a formation plane here
tm4.ponder.orechid_ignem.text_4: Put gold nugget, ancient debris and quartz in the filter of import bus
tm4.ponder.orechid_ignem.text_5: It's very important to place quartz fiber there
tm4.ponder.orechid_ignem.text_6: Don't forget to split cables with an anchor
tm4.ponder.orechid_ignem.text_7: Make the same filter in the ME interface like in the import bus: gold nugget, ancient debris and quartz
tm4.ponder.orechid_ignem.text_8: Put the configured ME storage cell with filter of gold nugget, ancient debris and quartz in ME chest
tm4.ponder.potion_generator.text_1: A lingering potion will generate aura with any positive potions
tm4.ponder.reactor.text_3: Далее разместите в центре топливный стержень. По диагонали от него ещё 2.
tm4.ponder.reactor.text_4: Пустое пространоство заполните хладогентом. В этом случае - алмазный блок.
tm4.ponder.reactor.text_5: Контроллер - мозг реактора. Разместите его на боковой стороне структуры.
tm4.ponder.reactor.text_6: Порты доступа используются для входа/выхода ресурсов. Используйте предметные трубы для взаимодействия с ними. Для работы реактора требуется уран.
tm4.ponder.reactor.text_7: На топливный стержень разместите управляющий стержень.
tm4.ponder.rf_converter.text_1: The smith's energy aura will generate RF energy with the aura
tm4.ponder.rf_converter.text_2: Now generate an aura in any way you like
tm4.ponder.ritual_of_rhe_forest.text_1: To make a forest ritual place these blocks and a tree sapling in the center
tm4.ponder.ritual_of_rhe_forest.text_2: Spread gold dust around the tree sapling
tm4.ponder.ritual_of_rhe_forest.text_4: To start the ritual, you need to place your recipe on the stand as shown in REI
tm4.ponder.spirit_mob_farm.text_1: Let's build a mob farm with Soul Revitalizer
tm4.ponder.spirit_mob_farm.text_3: Now we have to place 8 pylons around the Soul Revitalizer
tm4.ponder.spirit_mob_farm.text_4: Now we must put a soul crystal with 64 souls in it
tm4.ponder.spirit_mob_farm.text_5: Place a storage near the Soul Revitalizer
tm4.ponder.spirit_mob_farm.text_6: And an energy source near the Soul Revitalizer
tm4.ponder.spirit_mob_farm.text_7: And a mob farm started working
tm4.ponder.steam_power_generation.text_1: This is the best kinetic energy generation scheme in Create
Then place stone and dripstone above cauldrons
Now we have to make a pool of 11 blocks of lava
Now we will set up the Mechanical Arm
Set up Blaze Burners as an Output, left belt as an input, and right belt as an output
Be sure You fill the barrel with 4 buckets or Lava Buckets
Now we have to power our generator. You can use Windmill. Make sure the speed is 128. Otherwise it will break
When your generator started working you can destroy a kinetic power source
tm4.ponder.steam_power_generation.text_3: You can place any block instead of Brass Casing
tm4.ponder.steam_power_generation.text_4: Put the Lava Bucket in filter of Funnel
tm4.ponder.steam_power_generation.text_5: In The Filter Place a Lava Bucket and Click Deny List Then The Check Mark
tm4.ponder.steam_power_generation.text_7: It's time to place steam engines!
tm4.ponder.steam_power_generation.text_8: Don't forget to connect them with Shafts
tm4.ponder.steam_power_generation.text_9: Place Fluid Pumps Then Right Click them With Copper Casing
tm4.ponder.twilight_portal.text_1: How to build a portal in Twilight Forest:
tm4.ponder.twilight_portal.text_2: Place any flowers around the water
tm4.ponder.twilight_portal.text_3: And throw an diamond into the water
